entry.title: Alwatr/nitrobase: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
entry.content: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.

entry.content: A lightweight Discord client mod focused on simplicity and performance.

entry.title: Tbeaumont79/blog: A lightweight and customizable blog built with Analog. Features include markdown support, easy deployment, and a clean, responsive design. Perfect for sharing articles, tutorials, and personal thoughts.

entry.title: Chitranjan55/Catalog-generator: This GitHub project is a Changelog Generator Action that can be used to generate a markdown-formatted changelog between two Git references. The action is designed to be a simple and lightweight solution for populating the body of a GitHub Release.
entry.content: This GitHub project is a Changelog Generator Action that can be used to generate a markdown-formatted changelog between two Git references. The action is designed to be a simple and lightweight solution for populating the body of a GitHub Release.

entry.title: YashTripathi01/CodeChrono: Track your coding time effortlessly — CodeChrono is a lightweight VS Code extension that automatically logs your coding activity and provides daily insights.
entry.content: Track your coding time effortlessly — CodeChrono is a lightweight VS Code extension that automatically logs your coding activity and provides daily insights.

entry.title: RecursiveVoid/ecotopiajs: EcotopiaJS is a lightweight TypeScript library for tracking software power consumption. It monitors CPU and memory usage, estimates debugging and runtime energy impact, and analyzes CI/CD pipeline efficiency. Designed for eco-friendly development, it helps optimize resource usage and reduce the carbon footprint of applications. 🌱⚡
entry.content: EcotopiaJS is a lightweight TypeScript library for tracking software power consumption. It monitors CPU and memory usage, estimates debugging and runtime energy impact, and analyzes CI/CD pipeline efficiency. Designed for eco-friendly development, it helps optimize resource usage and reduce the carbon footprint of applications. 🌱⚡
